bio: Iâ€™m a passionate designer with 6+ years of working experience building human-focused digital products. With a strong visual Background, a degree in computer science and analytical problem-solving ability, I possess a professional ability to strike a balance between user and business goals while maintaining a desirable visual. I have led/collaborated in building usable products across varying sectors ranging from fintech, eCommerce, education and health through adopting the concept of lean UX and design thinking.
